title: Paper Trading vs Live Trading
content:
# Going Live

## Paper Trading
Simulated trading with fake money but real market data.
- **Always** start here.
- Verify logic, error handling, and API connections.
- **Limitation**: Doesn't simulate liquidity or psychological pressure.

## Live Trading
Real money.
- Start small (Minimum position size).
- Monitor closely for the first few days.
- Have a "Kill Switch" script ready to close all positions and stop the bot instantly if things go wrong.
